ygData.subject: Re: Battle Tactics (The untouchable wizard)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve found mine in the bank of Erudin. There are 3 NPCs there, the leftmost one in not a banker but a vendor, and he has the Enstill spell. I found it did
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 6 Jun 1999, NCI wrote:
> I've been trying to find the spell Enstill with no luck. Can you tell me
> where i can find that spell ?

I've found mine in the bank of Erudin. There are 3 NPCs there, the
leftmost one in not a banker but a vendor, and he has the Enstill spell.
I found it did work better than Root, but the mana cost is quite high !

Ramagh,
20th level Erudite Wizard,
Fenin Ro.

PS: How long does it take to get a last name ? I must have petitioned 5
times over the weekend already !
